channel.title: How do I use my "mysql" with the source. ( it won't run without it) - Today, 12:
channel.description:
I just want to code this source really bad, and have always wanted to use mysql from my c panel with my rsps.. I just never could find a tutorial. Every tutorial I found was with how to make mysql completly. I have mysql already in my files set up. I just don't know how to use it lol
Edit: I just read a 474 mysql tutorial.. Do I really need a .sql file because there is not one in my whole server folder.

item.title: How do I use my "mysql" with the source. ( it won't run without it) - Today, 12:
item.dc:creator: @iamprone iamprone
item.description:
@iamprone wrote:

I know I don’t have the sql file with it lol.

Read full topic
